alert.note: Alert for Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Slow moving thunderstorms will impact portions of central Duval County through 245 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baymeadows, or near Unf, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Mandarin, Unf, Arlington, Nas Jax, Baymeadows, Oceanway, Craig Field, San Marco and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
